message.name: HTTP_400_FILE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified file_id. Please use a valid file_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_LINK_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified link_id. Please use a valid link_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_CASE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified case_id. Please use a valid case_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_MISMATCHED_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_AND_CASE_IDs
message.locale: The specified case_participant_role_id does not belong to the specified case.

message.name: HTTP_400_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The specified case_participant_role_id is not valid. Please specify a valid case_participtant_role_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_MISMATCHED_LINK_AND_CASE_IDS
message.locale: The specified link_id does not belong to the specified case.
